title: Mac OS connecting problems
body:
Ever since i downloaded this patch i cannot connect to a game, i can search for a game, i can champion select. But i fail to actually connect to the game.

I am on OSX El Capitan. What should i do?

replies.body: Most league issues on a mac are usually due to network problems, and it seems that a connection is failing to establish to the game server.  I suggest going over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the resolution.  Make sure to use the mac box for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
